objects.specification: A rectangular floor plane with a solid slightly darker tone finish, smooth texture representing polished hardwood flooring with subtle grain detail, creating a sturdy base for the classroom interior.
A flat vertical wall panel painted in a light neutral color with a smooth matte finish, slender baseboard along the bottom edge, minimalistic appearance.

A large rectangular teacher's desk crafted from a rich darker wood tone, featuring a smooth polished surface, tapered legs, and a modesty panel at the front, designed for ergonomic functionality and visual prominence.
An ergonomic office chair with dark complementary upholstery and a sturdy five-star base on casters, adjustable backrest, padded seat, and subtle stitching detail in a modern style.
A large blackboard with a dark matte writing surface framed by a thin wooden border, minimal reflective glare, and a classic schoolroom design.
A tall wooden bookshelf made from a medium wood tone, comprised of multiple evenly spaced shelves filled with neatly arranged colorful books, featuring a simple back panel and clean lines.
A round wall clock with a slim black frame and white face, clear black numerals and hands, subtle glass cover, and a classic school utility style.
A rectangular window unit with transparent glass panes, a slender light-colored frame, and a minimalistic modern profile providing natural illumination.
A lightweight fabric curtain in a complementary soft tone, hanging from a discreet rod above the window, featuring gentle folds and a subtle texture for an inviting appearance.
